nodes.text: Star Wars: The High Republic Adventures — The Monster of Temple Peak

Star Wars: The High Republic Adventures — The Monster of Temple Peak is a forthcoming comic miniseries by Cavan Scott with artwork by Rachael Stott. It will be part of the Star Wars: The High Republic multimedia project and will be set just before The High Republic: The Rising Storm. Set to be published by IDW Publishing, it will be released over four issues beginning August 11, 2021.

The Monster of Temple Peak was revealed on January 4, 2021, in a livestream event celebrating the launch of the Star Wars: The High Republic multimedia project. It was announced as a graphic novel, but a first look at the comic published on StarWars.com on April 15 revealed that it would instead be released as a comic miniseries. Writer Cavan Scott has said that it will reveal a crisis in protagonist Ty Yorrick's past which is connected to events hinted at in his audio drama Dooku: Jedi Lost.
